metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2058 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: c2s/c2s.c in Jabber Open Source Server 2.3.2 and earlier truncates datawithout ensuring it remains valid UTF-8, which allows remote authenticatedusers to read system memory or possibly have other unspecified impact via acrafted JID.

criterions.comment: jabberd2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
